H0.text: A decoder is the part of a communication system that converts binary codes in a computer into recognizable characters.

H1.text: Encoder is the part of a communication system that converts binary codes in a computer into recognizable characters.

H2.text: The receiver is the part of a communication system that converts binary codes in a computer into recognizable characters.

H3.text: The transmitter is the part of a communication system that converts binary codes in a computer into recognizable characters.
